title: 70kbs download
body: Im getting 300mbs download but the updater is only updating at 70kbs. Anyone got any ideas?

replies.body: Update time can vary depending on each individual PC, with factors like your connection stability or even how well your hard drive writes data down.  Your best bet would be to let the patcher do its thing until it's done.  Once finished, you can run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good shape for any future updates.  I hope that helps!
